trans-unit.source: Dynamically performs hit testing on a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Esegue in modo dinamico l'hit testing su un <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.Stroke"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The IncrementalHitTester dynamically determines whether the user "hits" a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.
trans-unit.target: IncrementalHitTester determina dinamicamente se l'utente "riscontra" un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke>

trans-unit.source: This class enables you to provide immediate feedback to the user in situations such as selecting and erasing ink.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe consente di fornire un feedback immediato all'utente in situazioni, ad esempio la selezione e la cancellazione di input penna.

trans-unit.source: There are two classes that inherit from IncrementalHitTester: - The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester> hit tests strokes by determining whether a lasso path surrounds it.
trans-unit.target: Esistono due classi che ereditano da IncrementalHitTester:- <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester>hit testing i tratti determinando se è un percorso lazo circondato tale</xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalLassoHitTester>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester> hit tests strokes by determining where an eraser path intersects it.
trans-unit.target: -L' <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester>hit testing i tratti determinando in gomma intersecato da una tale</xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalStrokeHitTester>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists where to learn how to manage digital ink on a custom control.
trans-unit.target: Nella tabella seguente sono elencate la posizione in cui informazioni su come gestire l'input penna su un controllo personalizzato.

trans-unit.source: |To do this…|See this article| |-----------------|----------------------| |Create a control that collects digital ink|[Creating an Ink Input Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| |Create a control that enables the user to select ink|[How to: Select Ink from a Custom Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| |Create a control that enables the user to point-erase ink|[How to: Erase Ink on a Custom Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| ## XAML Text Usage This class is not typically used in XAML.
trans-unit.target: | Per eseguire questa operazione... | Vedere l'articolo | |-----------------|----------------------| | Creare un controllo che raccoglie input penna | [La creazione di un input penna di controllo di Input](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| | Creare un controllo che consente all'utente di selezionare input penna | [Procedura: selezionare tra un controllo personalizzato](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)| | Creare un controllo che consente all'utente di input penna punto cancellazione | [Come: cancellare input penna su un controllo personalizzato](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) | # # classe questo utilizzo di testo XAML non viene in genere utilizzata in XAML.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds points to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge punti al <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> per aggiungere il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> oggetti per il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"></xref> objects to add to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Una raccolta di <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPoint"> </xref> gli oggetti da aggiungere il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Adds points to the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge punti al <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The points to add
trans-unit.target: Punti da aggiungere

trans-unit.source: Releases resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia le risorse usate dal <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call the EndHitTesting method when the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester> finishes hit testing.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare il metodo di chiamata di EndHitTesting quando il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester>finisce l'hit test.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester>

trans-unit.source: Gets whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref> is hit testing.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene se il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"> </xref> hit testing.

trans-unit.source: The IsValid returns `true` until <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester.EndHitTesting%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la proprietà IsValid `true` fino a quando non <xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester.EndHitTesting%2A>viene chiamato.</xref:System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester.EndHitTesting%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then it returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"></xref> is hit testing; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.IncrementalHitTester"> </xref> è hit testing; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
